description: I'm 61 years young, age is just a number, not so?, I have been married & divorced twice before, I didn't learn the first time, heh heh, & I have non identical twin girls, from my 1st. marriage, both of my daughters are married, 1 of my daughters is here in CT & her sister is in the USA. I live alone in Wynberg, please cum visit me, we won't be disturbed & I promise you that all & everything will be ohk, I personally guarantee your safety, privacy & discretion...
